text: An apprentice funeral director shall not perform the following services unless he or she is under the immediate supervision of a licensed funeral director:
historical:

sections.text: The handling, preparation, or embalming of human remains;
The removal or transport of human remains;
Conducting or directing a funeral; or
Advising consumers making arrangements for the care and disposition of human remains, including arrangements made prior to the death of a person.
